unnormalised: Word on the street is that the annual Diwali Mela at Select Citywalk is happening on 28/10/2024! Get your ethnic wear ready because from 11 AM onwards, the place will be buzzing with lights, food, and festive cheer. Expect the usual suspects: amazing handicraft stalls, delicious street food (think golgappas and jalebis!), and enough diyas to light up the entire South Delhi.
normalised: Word on the street is that the annual Diwali Mela at Select Citywalk is happening on twenty eighth october two thousand and twenty four! Get your ethnic wear ready because from eleven A M onwards, the place will be buzzing with lights, food, and festive cheer. Expect the usual suspects: amazing handicraft stalls, delicious street food (think golgappas and jalebis!), and enough diyas to light up the entire South Delhi.

unnormalised: But wait, there's more! Heard whispers that a live Bollywood performance is scheduled around 7:30 PM. Keep an eye on their Insta page for the official announcement. Plus, some vendors are doing early bird discounts if you RSVP before 25/10/2024.
normalised: But wait, there's more! Heard whispers that a live Bollywood performance is scheduled around seven thirty P M. Keep an eye on their Insta page for the official announcement. Plus, some vendors are doing early bird discounts if you R-S-V-P before twenty fifth october two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: So, prepone your other plans and make sure to mark your calendars. This Diwali Mela promises to be bigger and brighter than ever before! Don't say we didn't warn ya!
normalised: So, prepone your other plans and make sure to mark your calendars. This Diwali Mela promises to be bigger and brighter than ever before! Don't say we didn't warn ya!
